title: The Replacement Plan
description: “We had a professional family photo done for my parents Mother’s & Father’s Day but right after we gave it to them, my brother got a divorce. My dad decided to cut my ex-sister in law out of the photo and replace her with someone else. Then he hung it on the wall like this... The post The Replacement Plan appeared first on AwkwardFamilyPhotos.com.
author: Team Awkward
excerpt: "We had a professional family photo done for my parents Mother's & Father’s Day but right after we gave it to them, my brother got a divorce. My dad
text: “We had a professional family photo done for my parents Mother’s & Father’s Day but right after we gave it to them, my brother got a divorce. My dad decided to cut my ex-sister in law out of the photo and replace her with someone else. Then he hung it on the wall like this and it still hangs 10 years later.” (submitted by Tara)
html:
“We had a professional family photo done for my parents Mother’s & Father’s Day but right after we gave it to them, my brother got a divorce. My dad decided to cut my ex-sister in law out of the photo and replace her with someone else. Then he hung it on the wall like this and it still hangs 10 years later.”

(submitted by Tara)
